title.narrative: YOUTH POLICY MAKING AND SERVICES

description.narrative: Adolescent boys and girls and young people are engaged and informed about decisions affecting their lives and contribute to the design of social services, which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Economic And Social Policy General, Evaluation, Human Rights Institutions, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Innovation, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Girls and boys, especially those affected by poverty, adversity and exclusion, progressively utilise quality, inclusive and efficient education system reinforced by policies, programmes and services for empowerment and participation, by 2022.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Adolescent boys and girls and young people are engaged and informed about decisions affecting their lives and contribute to thedesign of social services

description.narrative: UNICEF Montenegro continued to include adolescents and young people in gathering information, planning and developing new programmes. In cooperation with UNDP, UNICEF has developed an action plan and a set of activities to support the Directorate for Sports and Youth in developing the new Strategy for Youth 2022-2026. U-Report remained the main tool for communicating with adolescents and youth, especially during the pandemic. Steps were made to expand the existing PLH for kids programme to include adolescents as well.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/01/2022
